I should think the nose would extrude at least an armor ring in front of the drive ring to protect it from particulate impacts. Other than that, not bad.

They have beryllium alloy hull plating surrounding exposed areas like that. It's cheaper than building a shield out of it.

Also, the Field section is in front of the Drive Ring. The Field section needs a veritable wall or armour to protect the caravans.
